name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. James Edward GORE, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. James Edward GORE, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Judgment of Sentence of the Court of Common Pleas of Erie County is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: William J. Hain, John A. Bozza, Erie (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Michael J. Veshecco, Dist. Atty., Paul J. Susko, Shad Connelly, Asst. Dist. Attys., Erie, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
421 A.2d 211
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. James Edward GORE, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 2, 1980.
Decided Nov. 3, 1980.
William J. Hain, John A. Bozza, Erie (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Michael J. Veshecco, Dist. Atty., Paul J. Susko, Shad Connelly, Asst. Dist. Attys., Erie, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
